# üåÆ Taco Town

![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-18+-green?logo=node.js)
![Express](https://img.shields.io/badge/Express.js-minimal-lightgrey?logo=express)
![EJS](https://img.shields.io/badge/EJS-template%20engine-orange?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Taco Town is a **minimal Express + EJS** web app serving delicious taco recipes from a JSON file.  
Perfect for **learning server-rendered templates**, **small demos**, or **quick prototypes** -- simple, clean, and ready to deploy! ‚ú®

---

## üöÄ Quickstart

1. Install dependencies
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```
2. Start the app
   ```bash
   node index.js
   ```
3. Open in your browser
   ```
   http://localhost:3000
   ```


## Project structure üóÇÔ∏è

- Views: EJS templates (server-rendered UI)
- Public: static assets (CSS)
- recipe.json: sample recipe data used by the app
